title: The Last Pendragon
description: The day of Camelot grows thin. The glory of King Arthur's realm fades as his body passes into the earth. The light dims, the shadows lengthen. A great rebellion is rising to tear down the God-breathed throne of Arthur Pendragon. A man consumed with darkness is coming to claim his vengeance at any cost. The ghosts of the past rise to haunt the present. A time of darkness is coming, when men will pray for the sun and beg for release from the night, and neither will be found. Death, betrayal, and sorrow ride from the abyss toward Castle Camelot while swords of good men are brought to bear against evil. To face the darkness, a leader must rise to unite the land of Camelot - a king from the line of Arthur, a man of strength in spirit and body...
author: Walter L. Goodwater
